I go by Hobbes or JD. I'm the director of a freestanding emergency department and I'm very tired.

If you like labels, I'm Jewish, bisexual, and a Taurus. I'm married.

I love books, music, and movies - probably because all of those let me escape from reality.

And let's face it, reality pretty much sucks these days. But I'm here, exploring strange new heights of burnout, and trying to keep fighting.

I also like jigsaw puzzles.
